titles.title: A bill to provide for the reliquidation of certain entries of candles.
A bill to provide for the reliquidation of certain entries of candles.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Directs the Customs Service to liquidate or reliquidate certain entries of candles without assessment of antidumping duties and interest and to refund any amounts owed.
